ORDER_RPTD_SIG_INSTR.name: ORDER_RPTD_SIG_INSTR
ORDER_RPTD_SIG_INSTR.description: For each row in ORDER_RPTD_SIG_HX, this table contains the free-text instructions that were entered, if any.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with the instructions for this medication.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of instructions within this record.

columns.name: INSTRUCTIONS
columns.description: The additional instructions included with the medication instructions.

ORDER_RPTD_SIG_INSTR.INSTRUCTIONS: <!--EPICS-->Start with 10 mg at night; can increase to 20 mg after 1-2 weeks if no side effects<!--EPICE-->
